name: Paradox
description:
Welcome to PARADOX,

You are granted the ability to go back in time on the press of a button. Every time you press it the level resets along with your past selves appearing as clones of yourself that can help you solve the puzzles.

Help the future.
Cooperate with the past.
Do not collide with yourself.
Do not kill yourself.
Do not kill your past selves.
Do not break the events's coherence.

SImply put, survive and avoid time travel paradoxes.

Contains 30+ Unique levels with world leaderboards.
